item.description: THE AA FISHER CATS OF THE EASTERN LEAGUE HAVE A ONCE A YEAR DINNER AT THE RADISON EXPO CENTER. THE ROOM HOLDS 1,200 PEOPLE SO THEY ONLY SELL 1,200 TICKETS. FIRST COME FIRST SERVED. SEND A CHECK FOR $ 80.00 TO 1 LINE DRIVE, MANCHESTER,NH 03101. U WILL MEET THE FAMOUS ST LOUIS PITCHER CHRIS CARPENTER, WADE BOGGS, CECIL FIELDER, LOU MERLONI, RICH GEDMAN, BRUINS TERRY O'RIELLY, KEN HODGE, ETC ETC. I HAD A GREAT TIME THE LAST 3 YEARS THAT I WAS THERE. I PAID FOR MY TICKET. U CAN SIT AT OUR TABLE TELL THEM TO PUT U AT THE WWW.HENRYSBASEBALLCLUB.COM TABLE. U ARE ALLOWED TO GET 1 AUTOGRAPH FROM EACH PLAYER. SO WHAT I DO IS LOOK AT MY BASEBALL CARD COLLECTION AND FIND OUT WHO WILL BE THERE AND BRING THE CARDS TO THE DINNER TO GET THEM SIGNED. A AUTOGRAPH CAN BE WORTH HAND SIGNED $100.00. PLUS THEY HAVE A BASEBALL AUXION!! CALL ME FOR QUESTIONS AT 781 891 0621Â
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Henry to meet and sit at same table.
item.name: FISHER CATS ANNUAL BASEBALL DINNERCALL 603 641 2005 25 FAMOUS BASEBALL PLAYERS!
